original: intros m x x' z Hmap Hlink. unfold cF. unfold Br1. case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hx. + case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hx'. * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl. rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto. * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl. rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto. + unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. destruct Hlink as [Hne Hexp]. contradiction.
